meta.label: Text extraction
meta.description: Extract text from documents stored as PDF/Docx/HTML/etc into a dataset containing filenames and text.

params.name: extract_chunks
params.label: Extract text chunks
params.description: Output one row by unit of document. A unit can be a page in a PDF file or a section in a DOCX, HTML, Markdown, etc.

params.name: metadata_as_plain_text
params.label: Metadata in plain text
params.description: Output the metadata in plain text instead of JSON.

params.name: extract_pdf_outline
params.label: Extract PDF outline
params.description: Use PDF bookmarks to extract text chunks. May not be suitable for all PDF files. If disabled, only extract PDF page number.
